snippet.title: SCHiM Teaser Trailer
snippet.description: Jump from shadow to shadow in SCHiM. "A schim is the soul and spirit of an object, thing, or living being... [your] schim, who is attached to a human being, is separated from him early on in the game. Can you get back to him before it's too late?" https://store.steampowered.com/app/1519710/SCHiM/ #indiegames #gaming #cozygames
